item.title: What to Expect From Marvel and DC Games in 2025
item.description:
Marvel Games has had a pretty great run over the last few years. The LEGO Marvel Superheroes games were great family-friendly adventures, the Insomniac Spider-Man series has continued to elevate the superhero video game genre, Guardians of the Galaxy had some great writing, and Marvel Rivals is already a major success, amassing over 20 million players within its first few weeks.

Things aren't going quite as well for DC, however. Batman: Arkham Shadow is the one shining jewel amid a sea of disappointments for DC, with Gotham Knights and Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League delivering a disastrous one-two-punch for the brand's sales targets. It seems safe to say that 2025 is probably going to be a very different year for Marvel and DC Games.

Marvel Games Could Have a Busy 2025

Marvel Rivals Will Keep Receiving New Content in 2025

Marvel's latest success story, Marvel Rivals is a 6v6 hero shooter that's taken the gaming world by storm. Following the live-service model set out in games like Fortnite , Marvel Rivals has only just begun its journey, with its next season beginning in January 2025. Though no details of the next season's content have been confirmed just yet, developer NetEase has stated that new characters, new maps, and new modes will be coming to Marvel Rivals in future updates.

Marvel Rivals will likely continue to receive new content throughout 2025. Its current season, Season 0, is said to be around half the length of a proper season. This means that fans can expect Marvel Rivals Season 1 to last around 2–3 months, meaning they can expect around 4–5 seasons of content in 2025.

Marvel 1943: Rise of Hydra Has a TBC 2025 Release Window

In October 2021, Skydance New Media announced a brand-new project in collaboration with Marvel games. In September 2022, this Marvel project received its first trailer, seemingly confirming a World War 2 setting and that Black Panther and Captain America would be the game's central protagonists. In March of this year, the project was given an impressive story trailer that made full use of Unreal Engine 5, along with an official title: Marvel 1943: Rise of Hydra .

Marvel 1943: Rise of Hydra currently has a general release window of 2025. Even if the game gets delayed out of the year, fans can still expect to see at least a gameplay trailer for Marvel 1943 next year.

EA Could Reveal Its Two Marvel Games in 2025

Back in September 2022, EA Motive announced that it was working on an Iron Man game. In July 2023, EA confirmed another collaboration with Marvel, announcing a Black Panther solo game from brand-new studio, Cliffhanger Games. Little news on either game has come out since their announcements, but it seems likely that fans will get to see a reveal trailer for at least one of these games in 2025, likely EA Motive's Iron Man, as the studio hit a "major internal milestone" back in April.

2025 Could Finally Be The Year of Insomniac's Wolverine

Announced during the September 2021 PlayStation Showcase alongside Marvel's Spider-Man 2 , Marvel's Wolverine hasn't received any official update in over three years. While the Insomniac hack in December 2023 resulted in early builds of the game being released and some story details being leaked, Insomniac has made no official statements regarding the game's story, gameplay, or release date. Hopefully, fans will finally get to see at least a new trailer for Marvel's Wolverine in 2025.

Marvel's Blade Could Get Another Trailer in 2025

Announced at last year's Game Awards, Marvel's Blade is currently in development at Arkane Lyon. It's unclear how far along in development Marvel's Blade is, but there's a chance fans could see another trailer for the game in 2025.

DC Will Probably Have a Much Quieter 2025

Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League Gets Its Final Update in 2025

A live-service looter-shooter, Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League was meant to be Rocksteady's triumphant return to the DC universe, but it ended up being one of the year's most infamous disappointments. Despite its consistently low player-count, Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League has continued to receive post-launch content, with new playable characters being added every few months. But Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League Season 4 will be its last.

Finally adding Deathstroke as a playable character, Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League 's fourth season is underway, and it's set to receive an update on January 14, 2025. This will be the final update for Suicide Squad . Rocksteady has confirmed that the game's servers will remain online, and the recent addition of an offline mode will allow players to keep playing Suicide Squad when they are eventually turned off.

The Wolf Among Us 2 Could Finally Rear its Head in 2025

It's been a long and tumultuous journey for The Wolf Among Us 2 . First announced at the 2019 Game Awards, The Wolf Among Us 2 didn't receive a trailer until 2022. Telltale announced in early 2023 that the sequel had been delayed to 2024 in order to avoid crunch, though Telltale also saw major layoffs in October of the same year.

A second season of The Wolf Among Us was actually announced at SDCC 2017, though it was canceled when Telltale was initially closed down in 2018.

Back in April 2024, Geoff Keighley posted four new images from The Wolf Among Us 2 , confirming that the game was still in development. But nothing has been heard since. 2025 might finally be the year fans get to see The Wolf Among Us 2 hit store shelves, though the future remains very uncertain for the sequel.

Monolith's Wonder Woman Probably Won't Make a Reappearance in 2025

Another DC game that's been cooking for quite a while now, Monolith's Wonder Woman game was first announced at the 2021 Game Awards, and fans have heard nothing official since. Aside from some concept art leaks and some rumors about the game being live-service that were quickly put to rest, DC and Monolith have been radio silent. Recent reports from Jason Schreier suggest that Monolith's Wonder Woman didn't start proper development until after its announcement, so it's unlikely fans will see anything substantial from it anytime soon.

item.title: RDR2 and GTA 5 Actor Teases GTA 6 Involvement
item.description:
Summary

  • Actor Johnny Ray Gill may be part of the GTA 6 cast.
  • The 'Cross' star seemingly teased his involvement in GTA 6 during a recent interview.
  • Gill previously voiced various pedestrians in GTA 5 and Red Dead Redemption 2.

The Grand Theft Auto 6 cast may include Johnny Ray Gill, an actor who previously worked on both GTA 5 and Red Dead Redemption 2 . That's according to Gill himself, who hinted at his involvement in GTA 6 during a recent interview.

Rockstar hasn't yet officially confirmed any voice actors who have been hired for its much-anticipated GTA 5 sequel. But shortly after the game's reveal trailer went live in December 2023, some fans identified Manni Perez as the potential voice actress for GTA 6 protagonist Lucia.

Another actor possibly involved in the upcoming game is Johnny Ray Gill, the star of Amazon's crime series Cross . The 40-year-old actor seemingly teased his potential involvement in GTA 6 during a recent interview with YouTube channel Check It TV. As first picked up by The Game Post, the December 13 interview saw Gill reflect on his "dope" experience working with Rockstar in the past, in addition to hinting at yet another one of his collaborations with the gaming giant being on the horizon. "Stay on the lookout, you know, I can't say anything, but there's another situation happening, you know, in that [GTA] world, that may be coming out in 2025–2026, that I'm really happy about," the actor said around the 19:35 minute mark, all the while winking knowingly toward the camera.

GTA 6 Could Be Gill's Third Acting Credit in a Rockstar Game

GTA 6 would mark Gill's third acting credit in a Rockstar game, following GTA 5 and RDR2 , where he voiced various pedestrian characters. Prior to that, the Portland-born actor was involved in just one other video game, the 2009 browser MMO Cartoon Network Universe: FusionFall .

Stay on the lookout, you know, I can't say anything, but there's another situation happening, you know, in that [GTA] world, that may be coming out in 2025–2026, that I'm really happy about.

Apart from Gill and Perez, another actor potentially involved in GTA 6 is Gregory Connors. Game Rant previously discovered Connors's online resume that claimed that he's working on an unnamed Rockstar game slated for a 2025 release. The CV, which has since been pulled, stated that he was playing a "lead" role in the mysterious project, which is likely referring to GTA 6 .

December 5 marked the first anniversary of the GTA 6 reveal trailer. No new footage from the highly anticipated game has been shared by Rockstar ever since. GTA 6 is still officially targeting a 2025 launch, with Take-Two Interactive recently narrowing down its release window to next fall. Although Gill's latest interview teased a "2025–2026" project, this shouldn't be interpreted as an indicator that the game has been delayed. While a delay remains possible, it’s unlikely that any actor involved in GTA 6 would be privy to changes in its release schedule.

item.title: Roblox: Infinite Script Fighting Codes (December 2024)
item.description:
Infinite Script Fighting is an unusual Battleground game where, instead of using the usual abilities, you will use scripts to fight your opponents. There are very few similar Roblox experiences, which makes Infinite Script Fighting almost unique in this concept.

In this game, scripts play the role of superpowers, but they are many times stronger and more unpredictable. By redeeming Infinite Script Fighting codes, you can get even more scripts and choose the one that suits you best.

Updated December 18, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Codes are a great way to save resources and progress faster in the game. Use the ones we’ve compiled to enjoy a smoother and more rewarding experience.

All Infinite Script Fighting Codes

Working Infinite Script Fighting Codes

  • ISF2024 - Redeem this code to get Dubstep Gun.
  • 2MVISITS - Redeem this code to get +100 Kills.
  • ISFBANHAMMER - Redeem this code to get Banhammer.

Expired Infinite Script Fighting Codes

There are currently no expired Infinite Script Fighting codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redeeming codes from Infinite Script Fighting is really important because it will give you a significant advantage over those who have not done so. The rewards from the codes will be not only unique scripts that you can't get anywhere else, but also a bunch of other useful things that will come in handy, so don't neglect them.

How to Redeem Codes for Infinite Script Fighting

Since Infinite Script Fighting 's redemption system is quite common in other Roblox games, experienced players shouldn't have any problems with getting rewards. Still, if you are a beginner and don't understand how it works, here is a detailed guide:

  • Launch Infinite Script Fighting .
  • Pay attention to the lower-left corner of the screen. There will be a bunch of buttons arranged in a column. Among them, interact with the one that says Codes.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a black Redeem button below it. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the black Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see “ Successfully redeemed code ” below the input field and the rewards will be credited to your account.

How to Get More Infinite Script Fighting Codes

To get more Infinite Script Fighting Codes codes, be prepared to spend a little time, as it requires careful monitoring of the game's official social media. We have collected all of them below, so just visit each of them and check the latest posts for Roblox codes.

  • Official Infinite Script Fighting Roblox group.
  • Official Infinite Script Fighting Discord server.

item.title: Roblox: Boss Tycoon Codes (December 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Boss Tycoon Codes
  • How to Redeem Boss Tycoon Codes
  • How to Get More Boss Tycoon Codes

Boss Tycoon offers players to build their business empire. At first, you won’t even have a building, but by investing a lot of Boss Bucks, you can hire dozens of employees. And with the help of Boss Tycoon codes, you can significantly speed up your progress.

These Roblox codes can provide players with various rewards, such as Boss Bucks and Boosters. However, these codes tend to expire quickly. You will want to make sure you redeem them as soon as possible so that you don't miss out on these free rewards.

Updated December 18, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Unlock in-game bonuses with the codes we’ve listed here. We carefully verify them to ensure they’re active and ready for you to redeem.

All Boss Tycoon Codes

Working Boss Tycoon Codes

  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get 1K Boss Bucks
  • Speedy - Redeem this code to get Speed Boost
  • Boss Bucks - Redeem this code to get 5K Boss Bucks

Expired Boss Tycoon Codes

  • BOSS - Redeem this code to get Luck Boost and Boss Outfit

Boss Tycoon gameplay is pretty typical for the genre, as you need to earn money and buy various upgrades to make even more money. However, in the initial stages, it is quite difficult to progress quickly. To remedy this, you should use Boss Tycoon codes.

Each of these codes is a great source of free rewards, including the main currency of the game. Some of them will even give you up to 5000 Boss Bucks, so you do not want to miss these codes. But as always, they are valid for a limited time, so you should hurry.

How to Redeem Boss Tycoon Codes

You just need to make a few clicks to use Boss Tycoon codes, as this feature works as easily as in other Roblox experiences. So, follow these simple steps to get free rewards:

  • First, launch Boss Tycoon .
  • Then click on the Codes button. You will find it on the right side of the screen.
  • After that, enter the code in the box and click Redeem to get free goodies.

How to Get More Boss Tycoon Codes

Fortunately, the developers add new codes to Boss Tycoon quite often. This usually happens when players reach certain milestones, such as liking the game. And in order not to miss new rewards, you need to redeem Roblox codes immediately after their release. Therefore, we recommend players to visit the developers' social media. There, you will find all the news about events, updates, and codes first-hand:

  • Morl x 808mph Discord server
  • morl x 8o8mph Roblox group

item.title: If Pokedex Entries Were Literal (Volume 45)
item.description: Togepi is a great Pokemon to have by your side until it gets jealous.
